## Solicitation for Line Painting Services for Pacific Rim Hwy 4

### [Reference]: CB-8046-30636488

#### Tender Title
Pacific Rim Hwy 4 Line Painting, Pacific Rim National Park Reserve
Peinture des lignes de l'auto route 4 à la réserve du parc national Pacific Rim

#### Solicitation Number
5P468-23-0143/A

#### Tender Closing Date
August 29, 2023, 4:00 PM (MDT)

#### Estimated Contract Value
$100,001 to $250,000 (Taxes extra)

#### Description
This solicitation seeks proposals from qualified contractors for line painting services on Pacific Rim Hwy 4 within the Pacific Rim National Park Reserve. The scope of work includes:

* Yellow centre lines (solid, double solid, and passing)
* White fog lines
* Island cross-hatching
* Turn lane arrows
* 3 side roads
* Crosswalks and other pedestrian indicators

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria
 Lowest Price

#### Trading Partners
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
Canada

#### Regions of Delivery
British Columbia

#### Contracting Authority
Parks Canada

#### Contact Information
John Umuerri
John.Umuerri@pc.gc.ca
(431) 334-4503
1-855-983-1808

#### Site Visit
A site visit is recommended for all interested contractors. The site visit will be held on August 21, 2023, at 1:30 PM (MDT) at the Pacific Rim National Park Reserve administration building.

#### Enquiries
All technical and contractual enquiries must be submitted in writing via email to the contracting authority no later than five business days prior to the tender closing date.

#### Important Notes
* Bids received by fax and email will be accepted.
* Parks Canada does not accept bids via SAP Ariba; bids must be submitted via fax or email.
* Bidders must ensure that their email and fax transmissions comply with the specifications outlined in the solicitation document.

#### Documents
Bidder-specific documents are available at [Government Electronic Tendering Service](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Late submissions will not be considered. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.  [toggle 하고 보세요]
